video.title: Trotro
video.synopsis: Trotro the donkey may be opinionated, but he's as sweet as can be in this animated series that's full of good lessons for children.

episodes.synopsis: Trotro is playing hide-and-seek, but his ears give him away. / Trotro won't take his satchel off to play. / Trotro has decided to be a little monster.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: As soon as it stops raining, Trotro and Teddy go out for a walk. / Trotro does not want to get up this morning. / Trotro is in love with Zoë.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Trotro does not want to eat his fish. / Daddy and Trotro are going to fetch a Christmas tree. / Trotro doesn't want to share his toys with Lili.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Trotro loves sleeping in Mummy and Daddy's bed. / Trotro decides to dress up as a tiger. / Trotro gets washed all by himself.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Trotro invites Lili to come share his snack under a tree. / Trotro collects lots of little animals at the seaside. / Trotro is making a snowman.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Trotro enjoys using Mummy's makeup. / Trotro falls asleep while drawing and has a lovely dream. / Trotro has lost Teddy, his favorite toy.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Trotro and Lili find a little hedgehog in the garden. / Trotro is doing all kinds of tricks on his roller skates. / Trotro and Lili play in the pool.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Daddy teaches Trotro some dance steps so he can take Zoë dancing. / Nothing is going right for Trotro today. / Trotro is invited to Zoë's birthday.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Trotro gets an old toy duck from the attic. / Trotro finds a surprise toy in a packet of cereal. / Trotro, Lili and Zoë decide to swap toys.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Trotro tells Mummy he can't put away his toys because he's a baby. / Trotro makes a cake for Mummy's party. / Trotro decides to paint in his bedroom.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: It's snowing and Trotro is worried about the birds. / Trotro plants some seeds. / Mummy asks Trotro to fetch some vegetables from the garden.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Trotro really likes helping and being kind! / Trotro decides to build a sand castle on the beach. / Trotro has borrowed Daddy's boots to play outside.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Trotro plays a fishing game in the inflatable pool. / Trotro and Lili race each other. / Every time Bobo moves, Trotro does exactly the same.
episodes.title: Episode 13
